title: WTB:"Bad Boys" of the T206 Set
author: kamikidEFFL

posts.post_title: WTB:"Bad Boys" of the T206 Set
posts.post_content:
Hey guys most of you know "The T206 Collection the players and their stories".  Anyways, I finished basically reading the entire book and have to say absolute must read for any collector. Getting all the background history on these players makes you want to collect them so much more. 

Anyway, in the book there is a section called "The Bad Boys of Baseball". After reading the stories I figured what better way to start collecting the "Monster" than with none other than these "Bad Boys". I have the list below of all the cards need for this part of the set.  Now this is my third set I am currently working on so it's basically to keep my interest while I wait for some 34 & 38 Goudey's to show up at auctions and such.  

Following requirements
1.Graded by SGC only (what an I say I like uniforminty)
2.Don't need any hard to get backs
3.Grade can be no lower than 2. Preferably looking for decent looking cards.

List below of what I need

Frank Bowerman
"Sleepy" Bill Burns
Hal Chase-Blue Background Portrait
Hal Chase-Pink Background Portrait 
Hal Chase-Throwing Black Cap
Hal Chase-Throwing White Cap
Hal Chase-Holding Trophy
Eddie Cicotte
Mike Donlin-Fielding
Mike Donlin-Seated
Mike Donlin-With Bat
Jerry Downs
Jean Dubuc
Chick Gandil
Rube Kroh
Dan McGann
Larry McLean
George McQuillan-Fielding
George McQuillan-Batting
Bugs Raymond
Boss Schmidt-Portrait
Boss Schmidt-Throwing
Dolly Stark
Heinie Zimmerman
I have two nice ones.  Chase pink (4) and Kroh 5.5  $325 for the pair.  Give me your e-mail if you want a pic.  Both are super sharp.  Doug

posts.post_title: Re: WTB:"Bad Boys" of the T206 Set
posts.post_content:
I've got a deal on a Zimmermann and Gandil rite now.  

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=190377[/url]

I also have a Cicotte I could sell you.

ErikV

ErikV- Thanks for the quick response but really looking for SGC on these. Ill have to pass but again thanks.

Phillies*phan- I don't want to spend crazy money right now looking to grab a couple reasonably priced ones. I have my eyes on a few other goudey's and those come first. Thanks though for the response and will def keep you in mind if money frees up.
I'm actually trying to complete the same set. Definitely a great idea for a set. I started with the Black Sox players, but I couldn't stop with just those "Bad Boys." Best of luck!

I have these available, I included the PSA/BVG. 
Frank Bowerman  SGC 40/3
